articles.author: Agence France-Presse
articles.title: Cruel summer: US, Japan, Europe bake as heatwave shatters climate records - India Today
articles.description: While it can be difficult to attribute a particular weather event to climate change, scientists insist global warming -- linked to dependence on fossil fuels -- is behind the multiplication and intensification of heatwaves.
articles.content: By Agence France-Presse: Tens of millions were battling dangerously high temperatures in the United States on Saturday as record heat forecasts hung over Europe and Japan, in the latest example of th… [+5524 chars]
